attributes.action: Propose - 'That this House has no confidence in Her Majesty's Government'.
attributes.additional_details: A vote of no confidence is the only way the country will get to see the government it wants. If the motion is passed a general election can take place where all parties can run on a post-referendum vision for the country.
attributes.background: The country has lost confidence in all of you. Leaders are clearly self-serving and ignorant of the people: Cameron triggering a high-risk referendum that gambled with the country, brexiteers lying to the country then running to hide and an opposition that is not fit to oppose.
